SqlScript:
Use sufs

SELECT TOP 100 HHM.HouseholdMemberID,
      HH.HouseholdID,
      AP.ApplicationID,
      AP.OrganizationYearID,
      [HouseholdMemberTypeID],
      [FirstName],
      [MiddleName]
      ,[LastName]
      ,[DateOfBirth]
      ,[SocialSecurityNumber]
      ,[EmailAddress]
      ,[GenderID]
      ,[HouseholdMemberRelationshipTypeID]
      ,[IsRemoved]
      ,[EmploymentTypeID]
      ,[OtherRelationshipType]
      ,[MaritalStatusID]
      ,[CheckAuthorize]
      ,[FullName]
      ,[LastFourSSN]
      ,[isHispanic]
      ,[ReceivesChildSupport]
      ,[FiledTaxReturn]
      ,[IsMultiRacial]
      ,[PreviousYearHouseholdMemberID]
      ,[HasFoodStamps]
      ,[HasFreeReducedLunch]
      ,[IsFosterChild]
      ,[PersonID]
      ,[IsOutOfHome]
      ,[WizardUsed]
      ,[WizardFound]
      ,[WizardSuggestionApproved]
      ,[WizardStepsCompleted]
      ,[WizardSuggestionResolved]
      ,[NewPersonID]
      ,[OldPersonID]
      ,[SAPPersonID]
      ,[ConfirmedUnique]
 FROM [SUFS].[dbo].[HouseholdMember] HHM
 
 JOIN dbo.Household AS HH ON HHM.HouseholdID = HH.HouseholdID
 JOIN dbo.Application as AP on AP.ApplicationID = HH.ApplicationID
 WHERE EXISTS(SELECT *
    FROM dbo.HouseholdMember HHM2 
    WHERE HHM2.HouseholdMemberTypeID = 3
    AND HHM.HouseholdID = HHM2.HouseholdID HAVING count(*) = 1 
 )
  AND AP.ApplicationStatusID IN (2, 53) 
  AND AP.OrganizationYearID = 19
  AND HHM.HouseholdMemberTypeID = 3
  AND IsFosterChild = 1;
Name: FTC-SAS_FindARDApplication_FosterStudent
